title: S17 Ep81: Enter The Fright Club w/The Ghost Brothers
itunes:title: Enter The Fright Club w/The Ghost Brothers
description:
Darkness Radio presents Enter The Fright Club with Paranormal Investigators/Podcast-TV Hosts The Ghost Brothers!

The Ghost Brothers make their return to Darkness Radio to talk about the premiere of the second season of Fright Club on Travel Channel! Dalen, Juwan, and Marcus dish on their relationship with Jack Osbourne, whether they have had experiences with UFO's, and whether haunted dolls and clowns are scary or not!

New episodes of the second season of Fright Club air Thursday Nights on Travel Channel, but you can watch all of season one right now on Discovery Plus! If you don't have Discovery Plus yet, subscribe here:  https://www.discoveryplus.com/

The Ghost Brothers have a podcast!!  Click here to find out more about Urban Legends with The Ghost Brothers!  https://www.travelchannel.com/shows/ghost-brothers/podcasts/listen-to-urban-legends-with-the-ghost-brothers
